sentences.sContent: heavy showers of rain and hail

remMethod.val: hai(音似： 嗨) + l → 招呼 → 向…欢呼

trans.tranOther: frozen raindrops which fall as hard balls of ice

trans.tranCn: 致敬；招呼；向欢呼；猛发；使像下雹样落下（过去式hailed，过去分词hailed，现在分词hailing，第三人称单数hails）
trans.tranOther: to call to someone in order to greet them or try to attract their attention
